about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey in Mythara Chronicles, a tactical role-playing game that combines strategic combat, immersive exploration, and impactful decision-making. As a Hero dispatched by the esteemed Hero’s Guild, your mission is to restore peace to the beleaguered region of Rena. The city of Luecis is under siege by the formidable Demon-General Varynthaal, and only through uniting the divided factions can hope be rekindled.

EXPLORE A DYNAMIC OVERWORLD

Traverse a beautifully hand-painted, isometric world map. Discover vibrant towns, treacherous dungeons, and hidden campsites. Manage resources wisely and encounter dynamic events that make each journey unique.

MASTER TACTICAL COMBAT

Engage in grid-based battles where your tactical prowess is tested. Utilize class synergies, exploit terrain advantages, and position your party effectively to overcome a variety of adversaries, including demonic hordes and corrupted factions.

BUILD YOUR PARTY YOUR WAY

Assemble a party from a selection of unique classes, each with specialized abilities:

  • Knight: Serve as the stalwart tank and protector, shielding allies from harm.

  • Mage: Wield elemental magic to devastate foes and control the battlefield.

  • Ranger: Employ ranged attacks and set traps to outmaneuver enemies.

  • Warrior: Deliver high-damage melee attacks to swiftly dispatch opponents.

  • Cleric: Provide healing and divine support to sustain your party.

  • Bard: Enhance team morale and capabilities through inspiring songs.

  • Tamer: Summon and command beasts to aid in combat.

  • Rogue: Utilize stealth and deliver critical strikes to unsuspecting foes.

SHAPE YOUR REPUTATION

Your choices matter. Influence alliances, resolve political conflicts, and shape the future of Rena. Every decision impacts faction relationships, the morale of the populace, and the ultimate outcome of your quest.

DISCOVER DUNGEONS

Uncover hidden dungeons scattered across the overworld. Brave their dangers to recover powerful artifacts that grant unique abilities and unveil secrets of Mythara’s ancient past.

WHY PLAY MYTHARA CHRONICLES?

Mythara Chronicles offers a rich blend of open-world exploration reminiscent of classic RPGs and the strategic depth found in titles like Fire Emblem. Its hand-painted art style and emphasis on player-driven choices provide an engaging and immersive experience for both new players and seasoned veterans of the genre.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon II
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible GPU (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible GPU with 512 MB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for modern systems.

short_description: Lead the charge in Mythara Chronicles, a tactical RPG set in a world of magic and conflict. Unite factions, explore a hand-painted isometric world, and engage in grid-based combat against demons and bosses. Your choices shape alliances, the region's fate, and your party's journey toward hope.
